content: {"name": "Mercy Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://mercycenternj.org/adult-family-support-groups-and-services/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1104 Main Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Asbury Park", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07712", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.2239157, "longitude": -74.0102273}, "phones": [{"number": "(732) 774-9397", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No requirements"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
